item.title: James Comey asks judge to toss criminal case, says Trump-picked prosecutor Lindsey Halligan was appointed unlawfully
item.description: Comey argued that he is being vindictively prosecuted because of President Donald Trump's animus toward him.

item.title: Trump can deploy National Guard in Portland, appeals court panel says
item.description: The two judges in the majority, Ryan Nelson and Bridget Bade, were both appointed to the 9th Circuit U.S. Court of Appeals by President Trump.

item.title: U.S. and Australia sign critical minerals agreement with $8.5 billion project pipeline
item.description: The projects include rare earths processing, Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said at the White House during a meeting with President Donald...

item.title: White House economic advisor Hassett says shutdown could end this week
item.description: The government shutdown is dragging on with no clear end in sight amid a partisan Senate fight over health tax credit funding and other sticking point...

item.title: Trump calls for Ukraine to be carved up with Russia after tense meeting with Zelenskyy
item.description: Trump appears to be seesawing in his support for Ukraine, following his phone call with President Vladmir Putin last Thursday.
